程序包 org.group4

类 Text2Speech

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.group4.Text2Speech
  • public class Text2Speech
extends java.lang.Object
    This class connect the Text-to-Speech API and play the voice that it generates

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Text2Speech()
      Defines constructor to initialise the Text-to-Speech API parameters

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static Text2Speech getInstance()
      Gets the instance of text-to-speech using the singleton design pattern to avoid duplicate
      static void getText​(java.lang.String text)  
      void playVoice()
      Plays the voice from the file
      void startSpeaking​(java.lang.String intent, java.lang.Thread currentThread, boolean left, boolean right)
      Stores the responding text from Watson Assistant into the file

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Text2Speech

        public Text2Speech()
        Defines constructor to initialise the Text-to-Speech API parameters

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static Text2Speech getInstance()
        Gets the instance of text-to-speech using the singleton design pattern to avoid duplicate
        返回:
        the instance of text-to-speech

      • startSpeaking

        public void startSpeaking​(java.lang.String intent,
                          java.lang.Thread currentThread,
                          boolean left,
                          boolean right)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException,
                          javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                          javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Stores the responding text from Watson Assistant into the file
        参数:
        intent - The intend that Watson Assistant detected and used to decide the response text
        currentThread - The current thread
        left - its value is based on the story line, which is used to decide which music to display
        right - its value is based on the story line, which is used to decide which music to display
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if current thread is block or interrupt, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the voice can not play, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if the current line is unavailable, it will throw an exception
        java.io.IOException - if there exist input and output problem, program will throw an exception

      • playVoice

        public void playVoice()
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                      javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Plays the voice from the file
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if current thread is block or interrupt, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the voice can not play, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if the current line is unavailable, it will throw an exception
        java.io.IOException - if there exist input and output problem, program will throw an exception

      • getText

        public static void getText​(java.lang.String text)
        参数:
        text - the response text of Watson Assistant
